department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: For the acquisition of two prefabricated aluminum footbridges, including delivery in Shawinigan, Quebec.
description: The bidder must provide all supporting documentation and bid submission must be submitted at the latest by 2 PM EST on January 18th, 2023.
full_summary:
**Tender Announcement for Prefabricated Footbridges**
==============================================

**Reference:** WS3773238237-Doc3773267617
**Publication Date:** December 13, 2022
**Tender Closing Date:** January 18, 2023, at 2:00 PM EST

**Notice Type:** Request for Proposal (RFP)
**Procurement Method:** Competitive - Open Bidding
**Trade Agreements:** Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

**Contracting Entity:**
Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
11 Laurier St, Phase III, Place du Portage
Gatineau, Quebec
K1A 0S5
Canada

**End-User Entity:**
Parks Canada Agency (PC)
30 Victoria Street
Gatineau, Quebec
J8X 0B3
Canada

**Services and Goods:**

The Contracting Entity invites proposals for the acquisition of two prefabricated aluminum footbridges, including delivery in Saint-Mathieu-du-Parc, Québec, Canada. The objective of this RFP is to acquire the footbridges in accordance with the requirements outlined in Annex "Statement of Requirement."

**Eligibility Criteria:**

All suppliers must be registered with the Government of Canada and meet the eligibility criteria as outlined in the RFP.

**Evaluation Criteria:**

The bidding process will be evaluated based on the following criteria:

* Price
* Compliance with the requirements outlined in the RFP

**Proposal Submission:**

All proposals must be submitted at the latest by 2:00 PM EST on January 18th, 2023. Late proposals will be regarded as non-responsive.

**Contact Information:**

Francois S. Martineau (SPAC/PSPC)
francois.s.martineau@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca

**Notice URL:**
http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/14883366?extsite=MTQ4ODMzNjZfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==

Note: I've adjusted the format to improve readability while keeping the essential information as required. I've assumed that the bidder will be aware of the standard business days and that you don't need to officially mention the details on documents and paperwork, whereas in original text, it was largely the same content that has been cut down due to limit of response.
